description: An ES7/ES2016 spec-compliant `Array.prototype.includes` shim/polyfill/replacement that works as far down as ES3.
name: array-includes

scripts.lint: npm run jscs && npm run eslint
scripts.test: npm run lint && evalmd README.md && npm run tests-only && npm run security
scripts.tests-only: es-shim-api --bound && npm run test:shimmed && npm run test:module
